Sentencas: Solid oxide proton conductor materials are crucial for enabling hydrogen-based energy applications such as solid oxide fuel cells and solid oxide membranes.
Titulo: A Computational Study of Fast Proton Diffusion in Brownmillerite Sr2Co2O5

Sentencas: The improvement in the performance and efficiency of these applications requires the development of novel solid oxide proton conductor materials with higher proton conduction.
Titulo: A Computational Study of Fast Proton Diffusion in Brownmillerite Sr2Co2O5

Sentencas: Recently, brownmillerite Sr2Co2O5 (also known as Sr2CoO2.5) was reported to exhibit exceptionally high proton conductivity at lower temperatures (40-140 degrees C) compared to typical perovskite-based oxide proton conductors.
Titulo: A Computational Study of Fast Proton Diffusion in Brownmillerite Sr2Co2O5

Sentencas: In this study, we perform first-principles calculations to reveal the atomistic mechanisms of proton insertion and diffusion in this brownmillerite structure.
Titulo: A Computational Study of Fast Proton Diffusion in Brownmillerite Sr2Co2O5

Sentencas: By studying hydrogenated brownmillerite Sr2Co2O5 in a range of H concentrations, we reveal the diffusion mechanisms in brownmillerite, which give rise to faster proton diffusion than in perovskite proton conductors.
Titulo: A Computational Study of Fast Proton Diffusion in Brownmillerite Sr2Co2O5

Sentencas: The understanding of fast proton conduction mechanisms in brownmillerite provides insight into the future development and discovery of novel proton conductor materials.
Titulo: A Computational Study of Fast Proton Diffusion in Brownmillerite Sr2Co2O5
